---
title: "Week 1"
subtitle: "Introduction"
---

This week will be a general introduction to the module, probability theory, the history of statistics and the software that we will be using.

The labs will be an introduction to the {{< iconify simple-icons tidyverse size="1x">}}`{tidyverse}` dialect of the {{< fa brands r-project size="1x">}} statistical programming language via the {{< iconify simple-icons rstudio size="1x">}} API.
